start.title: The beginning
start.text: You are in your garden, drinking a Salvoy herb tea and enjoying the peaceful afternoon. The birds are chirping and the sun is glistening on your pond.

actions.text: Suddenly, Mika, one of your best friends, bursts through the gates. "(name), the crystal has been stolen!", she expresses in distress. "Can you help us? I mean, given your expertise as a (job)!".
"The ominous blue crystal, from which kyral energy is absorbed to empower our mages, was taken from us! I think the Galbari are behind this..."

options.text: "The Galbari could never do such a thing!"

actions.text: "Come on, (name), we need YOU!". She desperately tries to convince you to follow her.

Mika raises her left eyebrow in suspicion. "For starters, we have been at war with those *creatures* for quite some time now. Also, in the wrong hands, this crystal could have a devastating impact on the tides in our battles."
Mika leans her head to the side. Her arms are crossed. "Do you really think so?."

options.text: "Let's just say we don't know yet."
No, you are right. It probably was the Galbari people.

actions.text: *She approves your statment and resumes the discussion.*
"Let's go. We need to get to the castle keep. The king has urgent news about the theft." Mika moves towards your garden door, which still stands open from when she entered.
Congratulations. You reclaimed the crystal and completed the game!
This game is nothing for lazy people! You are an adventurer. Man up and take the job!
